name: Rollbots
description:
A 2-player game where you fight against each other.  Every 30 seconds a new round starts and new bonuses for your attack, defence and power will be rolled.  (Displayed as dice).

Will you keep your distance or go on the offensive?  Each round will force you to rethink your strategy.

This was our first game, and was made in just 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.  Unfortunately we did not have enough time left to add sound effects or music.  Perhaps the next one will be better...

ProgrammingAlex Vear
ArtworkEd Vear
DesignEd and Alex Vear
